attributes.action: Please close international arrivals & departures for the duration of LOCKDOWN
attributes.additional_details: A lockdown should mean no one entering or departing the United Kingdom thousands of people are landing from all over the world risking the lives of the security staff airline staff immigration staff et cetera, as well as risking the lives of all of us living here in the United Kingdom
attributes.background: It is absolutely ridiculous that flights from all over the world are still landing in the United Kingdom we need to close our airspace for the duration of the lockdown flying is not essential for anyone right now

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
